name: Get Rich Slowly
description: Get Rich Slowly contains thousands of articles dedicated to boosting people's financial IQ.

name: Mr. Money Mustache
description: Pete Adeney is the man behind the money mustache, and he's full of great stories and advice.

name: Money Smart Latina
description: Money Smart Latina offers helpful advice for people of many backgrounds, but especially focuses on financial literacy for the underserved Latino community..

name: Debt Free Guys
description: Married couple David Auten and John Schneider are the Debt Free Guys. Their mission is to help other gay men manage their finances better.

name: Rich & Regular
description: Rich and Regular provides an honest look at how to master your finances through simple concepts.

name: Marriage, Kids, and Money
description: Marriage, Kids, and Money is chock full of useful content for young families like paying off debt, retiring early, and reaching financial independence.

name: Inspired Budget
description: If you're looking for a budgeting system that works, Inspired Budget should be your number one stop.

name: The Fioneers
description: Launched in 2018 by married couple Jess and Corey, the website documents their road towards financial independence. They coined the term to describe their unique approach to financial independence.

name: Clever Girl Finance
description: Clever Girl Finance may be one of the best sources of free financial resources online. The site features over 30 permanently-free financial courses along with a host of other resources.

name: Brave Saver
description: Financial writer Elyssa Kirkham created Brave Saver to help people deal with financial fears and pursue a better life. Readers can learn how to practice daily money management.
